abstract:
In this cohort of 42 patients with mild COVID19 we describe the unique clinical feature of acute anosmia and dysgeusia in more than third of patients. Median onset of these features was 3.3 days after onset of illness (range 0-7) with rapid recovery in most patient.
Competing Interest Statement
The authors have declared no competing interest.
author: Yael Paran; Ronen Ben-Ami; Tal Levinson; Guy Choshen; Ksenia Petrov; David Shasha; Ruth Levinson; Avi Gadoth; Meital Elbaz
title: Anosmia and dysgeusia in patients with mild SARS-CoV-2 infection
